definitions.definition: the part of the human body below the ribs and above the hips.
examples: middle, midriff, abdomen, waistline tie a pink sash around the waist

definitions.definition: a narrowing of the trunk of the body above the hips.
examples: the last time you had a waist was around 1978

definitions.definition: the part of a garment encircling or covering the waist.
the point at which a garment is shaped so as to narrow between the rib cage and the hips.
examples: a jacket with a high waist

definitions.definition: a narrow part in the middle of anything, such as a violin, an hourglass, the body of wasp, etc.
the middle part of a ship, between the forecastle and the quarterdeck.
